reviewText: There is no closed captioning available. I am hearing impaired and cannot hear it or follow. It plays like an old fashioned movie in black in white, weird... at least it did in the beginning. I was hoping it would be easier to watch and understand. I still haven't watched it and I have had it for a few months now.
This appeared to be an illegal copy.  Quality was horrible at best.  This should not be bought from this company.
